name: Ringkas Asia Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a digital mortgage platform intended to help democratize home ownership and make it accessible for everyone. The company allows a user to be pre-qualified for a home budget in a few steps, free of cost, works with trusted partners to help qualify people for mortgages, and matches unique profiles to pre-qualified rates, enabling users to help qualify for a mortgage for their dream home.
one_liner: Developer of a digital mortgage platform intended to help democratize home ownership and make it accessible for everyone. The company allows a user to be pre-qualified for a home budget in a few steps, free of cost, works with trusted partners to help qualify people for mortgages, and matches unique profiles to pre-qualified rates, enabling users to help qualify for a mortgage for their dream home.
